structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: While actually on duty no member of the police force shall be liable to arrest on civil process or to serve with subpoenas from civil courts.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2896.
